item.title: I-85 North - Exits 87 and 89
item.description: I-85 north at Exit 87 - GA-400 North/Cummings/Buckhead. Approaching Exit 89 - GA-42/N Druid Hills Road.

item.title: I-85 North - Exit 86
item.description: I-85 north at Exit 86 - GA-13 North/Buford Highway.

item.title: I-75/I-85 North - Exit 251B
item.description: I-75/I-85 north at I-75/I-85 Split - Exit 251B - I-85 North/To GA-400/Greenville (SC). Continue north on I-75 for Chattanooga (TN) and Marietta.

item.title: I-75/I-85 North Approaching Exits 251A and 251B
item.description: I-75/I-85 north approaching Exits 251A and 251B (I-85/I-75 split). Exit 251A - 17th St./Midtown; Exit 251B - I-85 North/To GA-400/Greenville (SC). Approaching HOV exit for I-75 north.

item.title: I-75 North/I-85 North - Exits 245, 246, and 247
item.description: I-75 North/I-85 North in Atlanta. Exit 245 - Abernathy Blvd./Capitol Ave./Turner Field. Exit 246 - Fulton St./Central Ave./Georgia State University. Exit 247 - I-20/Augusta/Birmingham (AL). Approaching HOV lane exit for Memorial Drive.

item.title: Northbound Ramp from I-85 to GA-166
item.description: Northbound Ramp from I-85 to GA-166. Use right lanes for GA-166 East/Langford Parkway; use left lanes for GA-166 West/Langford Parkway/East Point. Continue in center lanes for I-75 North/I-85 North/Atlanta.
